articles.author: Katie Deighton
articles.title: Exclusive | American Customers Are Madder Than Ever - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: It has never been easier to buy stuff. But dealing with product and service problems has never felt so difficult, consumers say.
articles.content: Guests were sent scrambling on Nov. 9 when the hotel-and-apartment rental company Sonder abruptly shut down during their stays. Their keycards suddenly stopped working, locking some customers out wit… [+393 chars]
